languages.text: "Я узнаю воспитание Теодоры — ее тоже куда меньше интересовал долг перед {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простором{/g}, чем личные интересы. Но можешь быть уверен{mf||а}, что я не прекращу очищение системы Фурибундус от пиратской скверны. И если в процессе твоим торговым аппетитам будет нанесен ущерб — ты сам{mf||а} в этом виноват{mf||а}".

"Theodora taught you only too well, it seems — she too was far less concerned with her duty to the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g} than her own personal interests. But you can be sure that I will not cease cleansing the Furibundus System of the pirate scourge. And if your trade prospects are damaged in the process, you will have only yourself to blame."
languages.original_text: "Я узнаю воспитание Теодоры — ее тоже куда меньше интересовал долг перед {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простором{/g}, чем личные интересы. Но можешь быть уверен{mf||а}, что я не прекращу очищение системы Фурибундус от пиратской скверны. И если в процессе твоим торговым аппетитам будет нанесен ущерб — ты сам{mf||а} в этом виноват{mf||а}".

traits.locale_text: "Theodora taught you only too well, it seems — she too was far less concerned with her duty to the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus{/g} than her own personal interests. But you can be sure that I will not cease cleansing the Furibundus System of the pirate scourge. And if your trade prospects are damaged in the process, you will have only yourself to blame."

"Theodora taught you only too well, it seems — she too was far less concerned with her duty to the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus{/g} than her own personal interests. But you can be sure that I will not cease cleansing the Furibundus System of the pirate scourge. And if your trade prospects are damaged in the process, you will have only yourself to blame."

"Theodora taught you only too well, it seems — she too was far less concerned with her duty to the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus{/g} than her own personal interests. But you can be sure that I will not cease cleansing the Furibundus System of the pirate scourge. And if your trade prospects are damaged in the process, you will have only yourself to blame."

"Theodora taught you only too well, it seems — she too was far less concerned with her duty to the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g} than her own personal interests. But you can be sure that I will not cease cleansing the Furibundus System of the pirate scourge. And if your trade prospects are damaged in the process, you will have only yourself to blame."

languages.text: 「シオドーラの指導は実に巧みだったということらしい―彼女は{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}エクスパンス{/g}の義務にはまったくと言っていいほど関心がなく、己個人の利益ばかり求めていたということだ。だが覚えておけ。私は宇宙海賊の惨禍を生みだしているフュリバンダス星系の浄化を止めるつもりはない。お前の交易見込みがこの浄化過程で損失を被るとしても、自業自得としか言いようがない」
languages.original_text: "Theodora taught you only too well, it seems — she too was far less concerned with her duty to the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g} than her own personal interests. But you can be sure that I will not cease cleansing the Furibundus System of the pirate scourge. And if your trade prospects are damaged in the process, you will have only yourself to blame."

traits.locale_text: 「シオドーラの指導は実に巧みだったということらしい―彼女は{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}エクスパンス{/g}の義務にはまったくと言っていいほど関心がなく、己個人の利益ばかり求めていたということだ。だが覚えておけ。私は宇宙海賊の惨禍を生みだしているフュリバンダス星系の浄化を止めるつもりはない。お前の交易見込みがこの浄化過程で損失を被るとしても、自業自得としか言いようがない」

languages.text: “看起来，西奥多拉把你调教得太好了。对她而言，比起对{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}的责任，她认为她的个人利益更加重要。不过你可以放心，我已经打定主意，准备清除怒焰星系的一切海盗祸患。如果你的贸易活动会因此蒙受损失，那就只能怪你自己了。”
languages.original_text: "Theodora taught you only too well, it seems — she too was far less concerned with her duty to the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g} than her own personal interests. But you can be sure that I will not cease cleansing the Furibundus System of the pirate scourge. And if your trade prospects are damaged in the process, you will have only yourself to blame."

traits.locale_text: “看起来，西奥多拉把你调教得太好了。对她而言，比起对{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}的责任，她认为她的个人利益更加重要。不过你可以放心，我已经打定主意，准备清除怒焰星系的一切海盗祸患。如果你的贸易活动会因此蒙受损失，那就只能怪你自己了。”

languages.text: «Se ve que ha salido demasiado a Theodora. A ella también le preocupaban mucho más sus intereses personales que su deber hacia la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión{/g}. Pero le aseguro que no dejaré de purgar el sistema Furibundus del azote pirata. Y si sus perspectivas comerciales se ven afectadas durante el proceso, la culpa será solo suya».
languages.original_text: "Theodora taught you only too well, it seems — she too was far less concerned with her duty to the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g} than her own personal interests. But you can be sure that I will not cease cleansing the Furibundus System of the pirate scourge. And if your trade prospects are damaged in the process, you will have only yourself to blame."

traits.locale_text: «Se ve que ha salido demasiado a Theodora. A ella también le preocupaban mucho más sus intereses personales que su deber hacia la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión{/g}. Pero le aseguro que no dejaré de purgar el sistema Furibundus del azote pirata. Y si sus perspectivas comerciales se ven afectadas durante el proceso, la culpa será solo suya».

languages.text: « Je vois que vous avez bien retenu les leçons de Théodora. Elle aussi se souciait plus de ses propres intérêts que de ses devoirs envers les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues{/g}. Mais je vous garantis que rien ne m'empêchera d'éradiquer les pirates du système Furibundus, et si cela nuit à vos perspectives commerciales dans le secteur, vous ne pourrez vous en prendre qu'à vous-même. »
languages.original_text: "Theodora taught you only too well, it seems — she too was far less concerned with her duty to the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g} than her own personal interests. But you can be sure that I will not cease cleansing the Furibundus System of the pirate scourge. And if your trade prospects are damaged in the process, you will have only yourself to blame."

traits.locale_text: « Je vois que vous avez bien retenu les leçons de Théodora. Elle aussi se souciait plus de ses propres intérêts que de ses devoirs envers les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues{/g}. Mais je vous garantis que rien ne m'empêchera d'éradiquer les pirates du système Furibundus, et si cela nuit à vos perspectives commerciales dans le secteur, vous ne pourrez vous en prendre qu'à vous-même. »

languages.text: "Anscheinend hat Theodora Euch zu gut gelehrt – auch ihr ging es deutlich weniger um ihre Pflicht gegenüber der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Ausdehnung{/g} als um ihre eigenen Interessen. Aber Ihr könnt sicher sein, ich werde nicht aufhören, das Furibundus-System von der Piratengeißel zu befreien. Und sollen Eure Geschäfte darunter leiden, habt Ihr es ganz allein Euch selbst zuzuschreiben."
languages.original_text: "Theodora taught you only too well, it seems — she too was far less concerned with her duty to the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g} than her own personal interests. But you can be sure that I will not cease cleansing the Furibundus System of the pirate scourge. And if your trade prospects are damaged in the process, you will have only yourself to blame."

traits.locale_text: "Anscheinend hat Theodora Euch zu gut gelehrt – auch ihr ging es deutlich weniger um ihre Pflicht gegenüber der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Ausdehnung{/g} als um ihre eigenen Interessen. Aber Ihr könnt sicher sein, ich werde nicht aufhören, das Furibundus-System von der Piratengeißel zu befreien. Und sollen Eure Geschäfte darunter leiden, habt Ihr es ganz allein Euch selbst zuzuschreiben."

languages.text: "Görünen o ki Theodora seni çok iyi eğitmiş. O da {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Enginlik'e{/g} borçlu olduğu görevindense kendi kişisel çıkarlarıyla ilgilenmeyi yeğlerdi. Yine de emin ol Furibundus Sistemi'ni bu korsan belasından kurtaracağım. Bu süreçte ticari beklentilerin zarar görürse de bil ki tek suçlusu sensin."
languages.original_text: "Theodora taught you only too well, it seems — she too was far less concerned with her duty to the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g} than her own personal interests. But you can be sure that I will not cease cleansing the Furibundus System of the pirate scourge. And if your trade prospects are damaged in the process, you will have only yourself to blame."

traits.locale_text: "Görünen o ki Theodora seni çok iyi eğitmiş. O da {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Enginlik{/g}'e borçlu olduğu görevindense kendi kişisel çıkarlarıyla ilgilenmeyi yeğliyordu. Yine de emin ol Furibundus Sistemi'ni bu korsan belasından kurtaracağım. Bu süreçte ticari beklentilerin zarar görürse de bil ki tek suçlusu sensin."
